page.title: 10LOCAL CLUBS IN DRUMNADROCHIT
page.content: In{Drumnadrochit}there are various clubs for all ages.For the 2 to 4 year olds there is a{Mothers and Toddlers and the 3 to School age have {Playgroup.}These two clubs are held on different mornings but in the same place,the old Memorial Hall which has been adapted for young children so that they can draw,paint and play. There are many clubs for school children in the evening.The local hall hosts{Anchor boys}for the 5 to 7 year olds and the 7 to 14 year olds have{Boys Brigade}.Activities include football and badge work.{Brownies},for 7 to 12 year old girls,and{Guides}for 12 to 16 year olds are held in the Primary school hall.A{Youth club}is held for the seniors five days a week, with pool,table tennis,music and space invaders.We also have a snack bar which we sit and talk at.
